fields.title: About
fields.content:
About ephestr.us

This is Andrew Meyer's website. He built it all in two days using Django and a lot of creative thinking. This is his first deployed page using Django, but will not be his last.

Andrew (known elsewhere on this site as 'I') is a twenty year old from the Twin Cities, MN who specializes in nothing in particular. A creative problem solver by nature, he's grown to love programming - though mostly for the web.

fields.title: Contact
fields.content: If you want to contact me, go ahead!
